Commercial.information: We work with architects and owners to provide gravity and lateral systems to support the design intent.
Commercial.past_services: Our past services include new construction documents and designs

Commercial.information: We work with contractors to provide construction phase solutions, such as temporary shoring and verification of construction loading conditions.
Commercial.past_services: Our past services include structural reviews and construction design processes

Commercial.information: We work with steel fabricators to design connections and other steel members that have been delegated by the engineer of record.

Residential.information: We work with homeowners and their contractors to provide engineering solutions for home additions and modifications.
